assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: This essay is dedicated to the memory of both John Sulston, who died just before the Genetics Society Centenary project was launched, and Sidney Brenner, who died the day after submission. Both were thoughtful, clever, inventive and principled scientists, and role models. The author declares that she has no conflicts of interest.

publisher: Springer Science and Business Media LLC
